8. be productive﻿

comments.author: Don Julio

comments.text:
It says that "multi-tasking can cost 40 percent more time than 
single-tasking" cool. However, lets say that we have two tasks required 100 
minutes per each one. If I do it in single-tasking way, that means I will 
do both tasks in 200 minutes. However if I do it in multi-tasking way, I 
will complete both tasks in 100+40=140 minutes.﻿
